job.title: Software Engineer, Front End
job.description: As a Frontend Engineer you’ll take part in the design and development of software for the current and next generation of Tesla’s Enterprise Resource Planning systems. In this role, you’ll be developing highly complex applications with a team goal of streamlining business operations and improving overall user experience. The ideal candidate is a self-starter with a strong desire to increase efficiencies, and make an impact while contributing to a cross-functional team. Your ability to creatively collaborate and execute team goals will affect scalabiliy and directly contribute to the company mission of accelerating the world’s transition to sustainable energy.
